description:
Enforce disciplined AI-assisted programming workflows by requiring systematic auditing, analysis, and verified outputs at each development phase. Guide AI through structured phases like refactoring, feature development, and testing to ensure thorough understanding and quality results. Prevent skipping steps and maintain session state to uphold workflow integrity.

## Manual Installation
### Clone the repository
- git clone https://github.com/kingdomseed/structured-workflow-mcp
- cd structured-workflow-mcp

### Install dependencies and build
- npm install
- npm run build

Then add this to your MCP.json
```
"structured-workflow": {
      "command": "node",
      "args": [
        "/path/to/your/structured-workflow-mcp/dist/index.js"
      ],
      "env": {}
    }
```

capabilities.name: refactor_workflow
capabilities.description: Start a structured refactoring workflow to improve existing code without changing functionality

capabilities.name: create_feature_workflow
capabilities.description: Start a structured workflow for adding new functionality with integrated testing

capabilities.name: test_workflow
capabilities.description: Start a focused workflow for writing or improving test coverage

capabilities.name: tdd_workflow
capabilities.description: Start a Test-Driven Development workflow with Red-Green-Refactor cycles

capabilities.name: build_custom_workflow
capabilities.description: Build a custom workflow with full control over phases and configuration. Use specific workflow tools (refactor_workflow, create_feature_workflow, etc.) for optimized presets.

capabilities.name: setup_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the SETUP phase - initialize workflow and establish patterns

capabilities.name: audit_inventory_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the AUDIT_INVENTORY phase - analyze code and catalog changes

capabilities.name: compare_analyze_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the COMPARE/ANALYZE phase - evaluating approaches

capabilities.name: question_determine_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the QUESTION_DETERMINE phase - clarify and finalize plan

capabilities.name: refactor_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the WRITE/REFACTOR phase - implementing changes

capabilities.name: lint_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the LINT phase - verifying code quality

capabilities.name: iterate_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the ITERATE phase - fixing issues

capabilities.name: present_guidance
capabilities.description: Get guidance for the PRESENT phase - summarizing work

capabilities.name: test_guidance
capabilities.description: Get MANDATORY guidance for the TEST phase - execute tests and validate functionality after refactoring

capabilities.name: validate_action
capabilities.description: Check if an action follows critical safety rules

capabilities.name: validate_phase_completion
capabilities.description: Validate that current phase meets all completion requirements before allowing progression

capabilities.name: user_input_required_guidance
capabilities.description: Handle escalation to user input when iteration limits reached or checkpoints triggered

capabilities.name: workflow_status
capabilities.description: Check current workflow progress and session state

capabilities.name: phase_output
capabilities.description: Record the output/results when completing a workflow phase - REQUIRES ACTUAL OUTPUT ARTIFACTS with numbered file naming

capabilities.name: discover_workflow_tools
capabilities.description: List the workflow guidance tools provided by this MCP server
